# Run settings
pixels_per_node    = 75
speedup_factor     = 0.5
debug              = True
rng_seed           = 123123122
max_duration       = 50
node_display       = text
wrap               = false

!START_TRANSITION_RULES
# Adsorption
(3.341) O + Ag -> O + H2O
(0.537) Ag -> H2O
(1.419) OH_3F + Ag -> OH_3F + H2O

# Reaction
(6.226) O + H2O -> OH_3F + OH_top
(6.226) OH_3F + OH_top -> O + H2O

# Diffusion
(0.2) H2O + Ag -> Ag + H2O
(10) OH_top + 3F -> Ag + OH_3F
(0.5) Ag + OH_3F -> OH_top + 3F

# Desorption
(1.864) H2O -> Ag
(0.705) OH_3F + H2O -> OH_3F + Ag
(0.299) O + H2O -> O + Ag


!END_TRANSITION_RULES

# Initial state
!START_INIT_STATE
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag Ag
!END_INIT_STATE

# Colormap
!START_COLORMAP
Ag: (160,160,160)
{Intersection}   I: (200, 200, 0)
!END_COLORMAP
